org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors
Interface IGestureEventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractShape, AbstractVisibleComponent, BitmapFontCharacter, Cluster, DefaultArcballAction, DefaultButtonClickAction, DefaultDragAction, DefaultLassoAction, DefaultPanAction, DefaultRotateAction, DefaultScaleAction, DefaultSvgButtonClickAction, DefaultZoomAction, InertiaDragAction, MTBackgroundImage, MTCanvas, MTClipRectangle, MTClipRoundRect, MTColorPicker, MTComplexPolygon, MTComponent, MTCube, MTEllipse, MTImage, MTImageButton, MTKey, MTKeyboard, MTLine, MTList, MTListCell, MTMovieClip, MTOverlayContainer, MTPolygon, MTProgressBar, MTRectangle, MTRoundRectangle, MTSceneMenu, MTSceneTexture, MTSceneWindow, MTSlider, MTSphere, MTStencilPolygon, MTSvg, MTSvgButton, MTTextArea, MTTextField, MTTextKeyboard, MTTriangleMesh, MTVideoTexture, MTWindow, PhysicsCircle, PhysicsPolygon, PhysicsRectangle, PhysicsSphere, TapAndHoldVisualizer, TouchTailComponent, VectorFontCharacter
public interface IGestureEventListener

The listener interface for receiving IGestureEvent events. The class that is interested in processing a IGestureEvent event implements this interface, and the object created with that class is registered with a component using the component's addIGestureEventListener method. When the IGestureEvent event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.

Author:
Christopher Ruff
See Also:
MTGestureEvent
